title: Erroneous suggestion for uninferred const generic

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-suggestion-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: suggestions generated by the compiler applied by cargo fix

labels.name: D-invalid-suggestion
labels.description: A structured suggestion resulting in incorrect code

body:
Hello, I noticed that the error message for an uninferred const generic proposes an erroneous suggestion in this case:

I tried this code:

```rust
struct Foo<const N: usize>;
impl<const N: usize> Foo<N> {
    fn new() -> Self {
        Foo {}
    }
}
fn main() {
    let foo = Foo::new();
    //~^ ERROR type annotations needed
}
```

I expected to see this happen:
```
error[E0282]: type annotations needed for `Foo<{_: usize}>`
  --> $DIR/uninferred-consts-paths.rs:14:15
   |
LL |     let foo = Foo::new();
   |         ---   ^^^ cannot infer the value of const parameter `N` declared on the struct `Foo`
   |         |
   |         consider giving `foo` the explicit type `Foo<{_: usize}>`, where the type parameter `N` is specified
   |
help: consider specifying the const argument
   |
LL |     let foo = Foo::<N>::new();
   |               ^^^^^^^^

```

Instead, this happened: 
```
error[E0282]: type annotations needed for `Foo<{_: usize}>`
  --> $DIR/uninferred-consts-paths.rs:14:15
   |
LL |     let foo = Foo::new();
   |         ---   ^^^^^^^^ cannot infer the value of const parameter `N` declared on the struct `Foo`
   |         |
   |         consider giving `foo` the explicit type `Foo<{_: usize}>`, where the type parameter `N` is specified
   |
help: consider specifying the const argument
   |
LL |     let foo = Foo::<N>();
   |               ^^^^^^^^

```

### Meta
`rustc --version --verbose`:
```
rustc 1.51.0-nightly (80184183b 2021-01-03)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 80184183ba0a53aa4f491753de9502acd3d6920c
commit-date: 2021-01-03
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.51.0-nightly
```
